nodes.text: The Mandator-class Dreadnaught of the Mandator line was a class of dreadnought that served within the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. It was comparable in size to the Bellator-class dreadnought, although both were smaller than the Assertor-class Star Dreadnought, which was the largest vessel within their family of dreadnoughts. According to General Jan Dodonna of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, a capital ship would have to be at least the size of the Mandator-class to supply power for a planet-killing superlaser.
